channel.title: Reproducibility on RECON learn
channel.description: Recent content in Reproducibility on RECON learn

item.title: Introduction to rmarkdown
item.description: Installing the packages To install the current stable, CRAN version of the package, type: install.packages("rmarkdown") To benefit from the latest features and bug fixes, install the development, github version of the package using: devtools::install_github("rstudio/rmarkdown") Note that this requires the package devtools installed.
